resources.string: R-Kit is an innovative new research tool for Android. It\'s adaptable to fit your needs. Check it out on GitHub now or explore this app to see some example features.
Please agree to the terms and conditions
I consent to the agree by the R-Kit terms and conditions

Thanks for completing the task. Your results will be uploaded.
Use the Biovici reader to measure your hormone levels
Please turn on bluetooth to use the Biovici reader
Please select the biovici reader below, or search for new devices to add
Place strip on tongue for 5 seconds then plug in to reader
Tap the buttons as quickly as you can using two fingers.
This activity measures your tapping speed.

Rest your phone on a flat surface. Two buttons will appear on your screen for 20 seconds. Using two fingers on the same hand, take turns tapping the buttons as quickly as you can. \n Tap get started to begin.
This activity measures your short-term spatial memory by asking you to repeat the order in which flowers light up.
Some of the flowers will light up one at a time. Tap those flowers in the same order they lit up. To begin tap Get Started then watch closely.
Tap the flowers in the order they lit up
You didn\'t quite make it through that time. Tap Next to continue.
Please add a new diary entry
Time to complete a Cortisol study
Time to add a diary entry
